EmailTemplate.description: Email Template to be sent if Program is Inactive for 335 Days
EmailTemplate.name: Program Inactive Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c} has been temporarily closed/ inactive for 11 months
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Name__c}, {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c} has been in a temporarily closed/inactive status for 11 months.
Please contact the program to determine if they plan to reopen, or begin the closure process.
